name: health-speed-checker
description: Privacy-first PC health and speed checker

scripts.build: cd agent && cargo build --release && cd ../ui && npm run tauri:build
scripts.test: cd agent && cargo test && cd ../ui && npm test
scripts.lint: cd agent && cargo clippy && cd ../ui && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd agent && cargo fmt && cd ../ui && prettier --write "src/**/*.{ts,tsx}"
scripts.clean: cd agent && cargo clean && cd ../ui && rm -rf node_modules dist

author: Your Name
